title: old internet speed was 1 mbps new internet is 3mbps and i have 3x more ping anyone got some ideas?
body: i need some help with this after being used to 60 ping going up to 160 feels horrible

replies.body:
Changes in latency (ping) are often caused by changes made in your routing to the server along your ISP's infrastructure that cause your connection to take a longer path to the servers. I strongly recommend you start your troubleshooting by ensuring your network settings are aligned with our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if you have any further issues with your latency.
still the same ,tried  everything in the connection guide , its probably my isp fault but still if you have any idea on how to reduce the ping i would greatly apreciate it

I agree, it likely is an issue along your ISP's network routing to our servers. If you reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), one of our tech specialists can confirm all your local settings on your network are good before we take an in-depth look at your routing.

If you run a set of system/network logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to your ticket, it will give our techs the info necessary to investigate further. Let me know if you run into troubles with this.
